    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        @GetMapping("/getGame")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Game> getGame​(@RequestParam
                                                             java.lang.String gameName)
        This method is used to send the game back to the client when requester through this method
        Parameters:
        gameName - is given to search for the game from the client
        Returns:
        Game returns Game object. If the game is not found, returns code 400 (Bad request)

      • getGameCluster

        @GetMapping("/getCluster")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GameCluster> getGameCluster​(@RequestParam
                                                                           int page)
        This method is used to send the GameCluster object to the client
        Parameters:
        page - is given to get a set amount of games to display.
        Returns:
        GameCluster returns GameCluster object. If the page is not filled then returns an empty GameCluster object

      • getSearchGame

        @GetMapping("/getSearch")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GameCluster> getSearchGame​(@RequestParam
                                                                          java.lang.String search)
        This method is for searching the games throughout the store
        Parameters:
        search - the string is given to match with the game names in the database
        Returns:
        GameCluster returns GameCluster object with all the matching game names

      • getProductKey

        @GetMapping("/getProductKey")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GameKey> getProductKey​(@RequestParam
                                                                      int gameId,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String userName)
        The method is used to return the product key after a successful purchase
        Parameters:
        gameId - is given to know what game product key to send back
        userName - is given to know for which user this product key belongs
        Returns:
        productKey returns a string that contains product key for a game

      • addGame

        @PostMapping("/addGame")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Game> addGame​(@RequestBody
                                                             Game game)
        This method is used for a system administrator to add new game
        Parameters:
        game - Game object
        Returns:
        confirmation that the game is added

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GameCluster> removeGameToShoppingCart​(@RequestParam

                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     int gameId)

        Parameters:

        gameId - Game object
        Returns:
